description: Try our easy to follow Roast Leg of Lamb recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast lamb,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Roast Leg of Lamb Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Rub the lamb with olive oil, salt and pepper. Put the garlic cloves into a roasting pan with some fresh rosemary and sit the lamb leg on top of them. If you don’t have fresh rosemary, just sprinkle some dried rosemary on top of the lamb instead. Place in the oven.
Cook for 30 minutes then reduce the heat to 180°C and cook to taste – a bit pink is best. Allow about 30 minutes per 500g.
When cooked remove from oven, cover with foil and rest for 15 minutes before you slice.
Serve with roasted vegetables and gravy.
